recipes.title: Mexican Tuna Ceviche
recipes.recipe_description: Prepare a refreshing Mexican-style ceviche using fresh ahi tuna, diced avocado, lemon juice, and savory seasonings.

recipes.title: Grilled Tuna Steak with Avocado Salsa
recipes.recipe_description: Grill seasoned tuna steaks to perfection and serve them with a flavorful avocado salsa for a savory Mexican-inspired dish.

recipes.title: Tuna Avocado Salad
recipes.recipe_description: Create a delicious and savory salad by combining ahi tuna chunks with fresh avocado, lemon juice, and a variety of mixed greens.
